info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 2:55PM CDT until May 06 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR BRADLEY AND SOUTHEASTERN HAMILTON COUNTIES... At 355 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ridgeside, or near Chattanooga, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Cleveland, Lakesite, South Cleveland, Harrison, East Cleveland, Wildwood Lake, Collegedale, Waterville and East Brainerd. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 1 and 27. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
